meals.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti al dente according to package instructions.
In a pan, cook pancetta or guanciale until crispy. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, grated Pecorino Romano, and a pinch of black pepper.
Drain the cooked pasta and quickly toss it with the egg and cheese mixture.
Add the crispy pancetta or guanciale and stir well.
Garnish with chopped fresh parsley and serve.

meals.name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions.
Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then grill or cook in a pan until done. Slice into strips.
In a separate pan, sauté minced garlic in butter until fragrant.
Add heavy cream and grated Parmesan cheese to the pan, stirring until it thickens.
Combine cooked pasta, sliced chicken, and the creamy Alfredo sauce.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, etc.)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a pan or wok over high heat.
Add garlic and cubed tofu or chicken (if using), and stir-fry until browned.
Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry for a few minutes.
In a small bowl, mix soy sauce and cornstarch to create a sauce, then pour it over the stir-fry.
Stir until the sauce thickens and coats the ingredients.
Serve over rice or noodles.

meals.name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Preheat your oven to the highest temperature it can go (usually around 500°F or 260°C).
Roll out the pizza dough into a thin round shape.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough and top with mozzarella cheese.
Season with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly and slightly browned.
Remove from the oven, drizzle with olive oil, and garnish with fresh basil leaves. Slice and serve.

meals.name: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing and season with salt and pepper.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese. Toss to combine.
Serve with lemon wedges and extra Parmesan cheese if desired.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
steps: In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and follow package instructions for seasoning.
Warm taco shells in the oven or microwave.
Fill taco shells with seasoned beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Serve and enjoy your homemade beef tacos.

meals.name: Salmon with Lemon-Dill Sauce
steps: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and dill. Place lemon slices on top of the fillets.
Drizzle olive oil over the salmon.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 15-20 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through.
Serve with additional lemon and dill for garnish.

meals.name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: In a large pan, heat the olive oil and 1 tablespoon of butter over medium heat.
Add chopped onions and garlic, sauté until translucent.
Add Arborio rice and stir to coat with the oil and butter.
Pour in the white wine and cook until it's mostly absorbed.
Begin adding the broth one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until the liquid is absorbed before adding more.
In a separate pan, sauté the mushrooms with the remaining butter until they're browned.
When the rice is creamy and cooked al dente, remove from heat, stir in the sautéed mushrooms, and Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and black pepper, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve.

meals.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Sandwiches
ingredients: 2 lbs pork shoulder or butt roast
steps: Season the pork roast with salt and pepper, then place it in a slow cooker.
Pour the barbecue sauce over the pork and cook on low for 8 hours or until the pork is tender and can be easily shredded.
Shred the cooked pork with two forks and mix it with the sauce.
Toast the hamburger buns, then fill them with pulled pork.
Add coleslaw and pickles if desired, and serve.

meals.name: Vegetable Curry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., carrots, potatoes, peas)
Cooked rice or naan bread (for serving)
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a pan, then sauté the chopped onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add the curry paste and stir-fry for a minute.
Add mixed vegetables and stir to coat them with the curry paste.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer until the vegetables are tender and the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve with rice or naan bread.

meals.name: Vegetarian Chili
steps: In a large pot, sauté onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add diced tomatoes, beans, corn, bell pepper, and spices.
Simmer on low heat for 20-30 minutes until the chili thickens.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with sour cream, grated cheddar cheese, and chopped green onions.

meals.name: Shrimp Scampi
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions and drain.
In a large skillet, melt butter and heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until they turn pink, about 2 minutes per side.
Stir in white wine and lemon juice, then add cooked pasta and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh parsley, and add red pepper flakes if you like it spicy.

meals.name: Mango Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed
steps: In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.
Sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and cook for another minute.
Add mango and coconut milk, then simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve with rice.

meals.name: Chicken Fajitas
steps: Season chicken with fajita seasoning and grill or cook in a pan until done.
Slice the cooked chicken into strips.
In a separate pan, sauté onions and bell peppers until tender.
Warm the tortillas, then fill them with chicken, peppers, and onions.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

meals.name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Bread the eggplant slices and bake until crispy.
Layer eggplant slices, marinara sauce, and cheeses in a baking dish.
Bake until cheese is bubbly and golden brown.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve.

meals.name: Miso Soup
steps: Heat dashi to near boiling and remove from heat.
Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of dashi, then add it to the pot.
Add tofu and simmer until heated through.
Garnish with green onions and seaweed if desired.

meals.name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 lb beef sirloin, sliced into strips
steps: In a large skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat.
Add sliced beef and cook until browned. Remove from the pan.
Sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Stir in flour and cook for a minute.
Gradually add beef broth and sour cream, stirring until the sauce thickens.
Return the cooked beef to the pan and heat through.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve over cooked egg noodles.

meals.name: Tofu Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., broccoli, bell peppers, snap peas)
steps: In a wok or large pan, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add tofu cubes and stir-fry until lightly browned.
Add mixed vegetables and garlic, stir-frying until the veggies are tender-crisp.
Stir in soy sauce and hoisin sauce, mixing well.
Serve over cooked rice.

meals.name: Homemade Sushi Rolls
ingredients: Assorted fillings (e.g., fish, avocado, cucumber, crab)
steps: Place a sheet of plastic wrap on the bamboo mat, then put a sheet of nori seaweed on top.
Wet your hands and spread sushi rice over the nori, leaving a small border at the top.
Add your choice of fillings on the rice.
Roll the bamboo mat tightly to form the sushi roll, wetting the nori's border to seal it.
Slice the roll into bite-sized pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

meals.name: Lemon Butter Shrimp Pasta
ingredients: 1 lb large shrimp, peeled and deveined
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions and drain.
Season shrimp with salt and black pepper.
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat, then add shrimp and minced garlic.
Cook shrimp until pink and opaque, then add lemon juice and zest.
Toss cooked pasta with the lemon butter sauce and shrimp.
Garnish with fresh parsley and serve.
